title: Royal Darling
alternative_title: Kokuou Heika wa Mama ni Naritai ; Royal Darling ; 国王陛下はママになりたい
status: Kokuou Heika wa Mama ni Naritai ; Royal Darling ; 国王陛下はママになりたい
description:
Description :
        After 16 years of unrequited feelings, King Luna finds himself entangled in a whirlwind of love and family with his crush, Captain of the Knights, Jake. It all begins with an innocent request from Luna's younger brother: 'I want a Mama and Papa!' As they navigate their new roles in this makeshift family, including a fake marriage, the bond between Luna and Jake grows stronger. However, the challenges of parenthood weigh heavily on Luna, leaving him feeling worthless. When he finally reveals his vulnerabilities to Jake, he finds solace in Jake's strong, gentle embrace. But as Jake's kindness continues to melt Luna's defenses, will he be able to keep his lingering feelings at bay?+
